title: Reliance Power's 2 subsidiaries settle Rs 1,023-cr debt
description: Reliance Power's subsidiaries settled debt of Rs 1,023 crore with Reliance Commercial Finance, owned by Authum Investment. The debt settlement follows the sale of a wind power project in Maharashtra. Reliance Power aims to become debt-free by March 31, 2024, after selling assets to retire debts.
